Divorces in New Zealand in 2020

nz_divorces_2020.Rd

Counts of divorces by age and sex, in New Zealand, 2020.

Usage

nz_divorces_2020

Format

A data frame with the following variables:

  • age: Age, in 5-year age groups, "15-19" to "65+".

  • sex: "Female" or "Male".

  • nevent: Numbers of divorces during year.

Source

Derived from data in table "Age at divorces by sex (marriages and civil unions) (Annual-Dec)" in the online database Infoshare on the Statistics New Zealand website. Data downloaded on 22 March 2023.

See also

  • nz_divorces data for 1992-2021

  • nz_population_2020 population at risk
